titleStmt.title: The church triumphant, or, A comfortable treatise of the amplitude and largeness of the kingdom of Christ wherein is proved by Scriptures and reason, that the number of the damned is inferiour to that of the elect / by Joseph Alford ...
titleStmt.author: Alford, Joseph.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Bentley for J. Williams at the Crown in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
